text: apanee haisiyat ke anusaar yahaan tum svayan rahate ho unhen bhee usee jagah rakho. aur unhen tang karane ke lie unhen haani na pahunchao. aur yadi ve garbhavatee ho to unapar kharch karate raho jab tak ki unaka shishu-prasav na ho jae. phir yadi ve tumhaare lie (shishu ko) doodh pilaen to tum unhen unaka paarishraamik do aur aapas mein bhalee reeti se paraspar baatacheet ke dvaar koee baat tay kar lo. aur yadi tum donon mein koee kathinaee ho to phir koee doosaree stree usake lie doodh pila degee
